main event: A university student reported sighting an unidentified flying object (UFO) in Norris, Tennessee on April 4, 1954.
interesting points: The UFO was observed for approximately 5 minutes,The object was moving southwest at a consistent speed without any change in altitude,Two students from different universities corroborated each other's sightings,The weather conditions were partly cloudy with a high ceiling and unlimited visibility,There is no photographic evidence of the sighting.
witness description: university students from University of Tennessee and Sewanee
